column3: In celebration and calculation do we bring a Heavensturn gift, from the Far East to Eorzea. Long may we be of good blood!

Has \x02\x08\x13\xe9\x05\xff\x07m'lady\xff\x07m'lord\x03 perhaps misplaced the gift \x02\x08\x0c\xe9\x05\xff\x04she\xff\x03he\x03 was given, that which the giver and the gifted alike call the uma kabuto?
You are a \x02\x08\x0f\xe9\x05\xff\x06woman\xff\x04man\x03 fearless and clueless to lose an item of such import! I shall give you another, but misplace it not again.
